trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contiene i dati associati con la chiusura di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs viene generato dal runtime quando un'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata, l'infrastruttura di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>associata con un flusso di lavoro istanza include un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>configurato per un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, il flusso di lavoro inserisce infrastruttura di rilevamento di TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>nel <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>che invia al servizio di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza del flusso di lavoro può essere terminata in tre modi: l'host può chiamare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>attività può essere richiamata dall'interno dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro o si verifichi un'eccezione non gestita.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Se il flusso di lavoro viene terminata dall'host o un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>attività, il set di infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>a un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>con relativo <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>proprietà è impostata su una descrizione del motivo della chiusura.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il flusso di lavoro viene terminato a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime passa l'eccezione non gestita in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs è utilizzata solo dal servizio di rilevamento di runtime per passare informazioni in un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: I dati per un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>evento viene passato un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminato a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, l'eccezione contiene l'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da una chiamata dell'host per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o da un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>eccezione di attività, contiene un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>con relativo <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>impostata per una descrizione del motivo della chiusura.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'host termina l'istanza del flusso di lavoro, fornisce questa descrizione nel `string` parametro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; Se l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>la descrizione è fornita da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.
